009
010package imagingbook.pub.threshold.adaptive;
011
012import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
013import imagingbook.lib.util.ParameterBundle;
014import imagingbook.pub.threshold.BackgroundMode;
015import imagingbook.pub.threshold.global.OtsuThresholder;
016
017/**
018 * This thresholder splits the image into non-overlapping square
019 * sub-images, computes the optimal threshold within each sub-image 
020 * (using an Otsu thresholder) and interpolates linearly between 
021 * these local thresholds.
022 */
023public class InterpolatingThresholder extends AdaptiveThresholder {
024        
025        public static class Parameters implements ParameterBundle {
026                public int tileSize = 32;
027                public BackgroundMode bgMode = BackgroundMode.DARK;
028        }
029        
030        private final Parameters params;
031        
032        public InterpolatingThresholder() {
033                this.params = new Parameters();
034        }
035        
036        public InterpolatingThresholder(Parameters params) {
037                this.params = params;
038        }
039
040        @Override
041        public ByteProcessor getThreshold(ByteProcessor ip) {
042                final int W = ip.getWidth();
043                final int H = ip.getHeight();
044                final int tileSize = params.tileSize;
045                
046                // determine number of tiles
047                int nW = (W % tileSize == 0) ? (W / tileSize + 1) : (W / tileSize + 2);
048                int nH = (H % tileSize == 0) ? (H / tileSize + 1) : (H / tileSize + 2);
049                
050                int[][] tiles = new int[nW][nH];
051                int s0 = tileSize / 2;  // center of title (s0 + s1 = tileSize)
052//              int s1 = tileSize - s0;
053
054                // compute threshold for each tile
055                int[] h = new int[256];
056                OtsuThresholder thr = new OtsuThresholder();
057
058                int q_ = (params.bgMode == BackgroundMode.DARK) ? 256 : 0;
059
060                for (int j = 0, v0 = 0; j < nH; j++, v0 += tileSize) {
061                        for (int i = 0, u0 = 0; i < nW; i++, u0 += tileSize) {
062                                getSubimageHistogram(ip, u0 - s0, v0 - s0, tileSize, h);
063                                int q = thr.getThreshold(h);
064                                if (q < 0) q = q_; // no threshold found in this tile
065                                tiles[i][j] = q;
066                                //IJ.log(i + "/" + j + ": " + q);
067                        }
068                }
069                
070                ByteProcessor thrIp = new ByteProcessor(W, H);
071                
072                for (int j = 0, v0 = 0; j < nH; j++, v0 += tileSize) {
073                        for (int i = 0, u0 = 0; i < nW; i++, u0 += tileSize) {
074                                // Rectangle re = new Rectangle(u0-s0, v0-s0, u0-s0+tileSize, v0-s0+tileSize);
075                                for (int v = v0 - s0; v < v0 - s0 + tileSize; v++) {
076                                        for (int u = u0 - s0; u < u0 - s0 + tileSize; u++) {
077                                                thrIp.putPixel(u, v, tiles[i][j]);
078                                        }
079                                }
080                        }
081                }
082                
083                // linearly interpolate
084                for (int j = 0, v0 = 0; j < nH - 1; j++, v0 += tileSize) {
085                        for (int i = 0, u0 = 0; i < nW - 1; i++, u0 += tileSize) {
086                                int A = tiles[i][j];
087                                int B = tiles[i + 1][j];
088                                int C = tiles[i][j + 1];
089                                int D = tiles[i + 1][j + 1];
090
091                                // interpolate within [u0, v0, u0 + tileSize, v0 + tileSize]
092                                for (int v = v0; v < v0 + tileSize; v++) {
093                                        double dy = (double) (v - v0) / tileSize;
094                                        double AC = A + dy * (C - A);
095                                        double BD = B + dy * (D - B);
096                                        for (int u = u0; u < u0 + tileSize; u++) {
097                                                double dx = (double) (u - u0) / tileSize;
098                                                double ABCD = AC + dx * (BD - AC);
099                                                // thrIp.putPixel(u,v,tiles[i][j]);
100                                                thrIp.putPixel(u, v, (int) Math.rint(ABCD));
101                                        }
102                                }
103
104                        }
105                }
106                        
107                return thrIp;
108        }
109        
110        private void getSubimageHistogram(ByteProcessor ip, int u0, int v0, int size, int[] h) {
111                for (int i = 0; i < h.length; i++) {
112                        h[i] = 0;
113                }
114                for (int v = v0; v < v0 + size; v++) {
115                        for (int u = u0; u < u0 + size; u++) {
116                                int p = getPaddedPixel(ip, u, v);
117                                h[p]++;
118                        }
119                }
120        }
121
122}
